column2: Naval  and  fishing  communities  are  advised  not  to  venture  into  the  sea  areas
bounded by (18N - 25N) and between (65E – 75E) until further notice.
Those who are out at aforementioned sea regions are advised to return to coasts or
This is the final advisory with regarding the Very Severe Cyclonic Storm “Biparjoy”.
Fishing and naval community are requested to be attentive to future sea area
forecasts issued by the Department of Meteorology at 07.00 a.m. (weather
